altTitles.ja: アグネス仮面

description.en: Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: 幻想郷の海
大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

title.en: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Skill Board wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo o Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru
Rettou Hito no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja: 劣等人の魔剣使い　スキルボードを駆使して最強に至る

altTitles.en: Inferior Magic Swordsman: Using the Skill Board to Become the Strongest
Using the Skill Board as an Inferior Magic Swordsman to Become the Strongest
Use the Skill Board to Become the Most Powerful Swordsman

altTitles.th: การใช้สกิลบอร์ด เพื่อเข้าถึงการเป็นผู้ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดของนักดาบเวทมนตร์ผู้ต่ำต้อย

altTitles.zh: 劣等人魔剑使运用技能板成为最强

altTitles.zh-hk: 劣等人魔劍使　運用技能板成為最強

altTitles.tr: Reenkarnasyon Geçirmiş Alt Tabaka Büyülü Kılıç Ustası

description.en: A normal office worker, Toru Minasuki, was swallowed up by a dimensional fissure and reincarnated into a different world. Upon reincarnation, Toru was given a [skill board] by God. Make the most of it to acquire all the necessary skills! Even though he is an "inferior person," he'll make his way to the top!
description.it: Un normale impiegato, Toru Minasuki, è stato inghiottito da una fessura dimensionale e si è reincarnato in un altro mondo. Dopo la reincarnazione, a Toru viene donata una [skillboard] da Dio. Ne approfitterà per acquisire tutte le abilità necessarie a sopravvivere in questo mondo! Nonostante sia una "lost person".
description.ru: Обычный офисный работник, Тору Мизунори, был поглощен огромной расщелиной и был перерожден в другом мире. После перерождения Бог дал Тору "список навыков". Сделай все возможное, что бы приобрести все нужные навыки! Несмотря на то, что он "слабейший человек", он пробьется к вершине.
description.th: มิซึโนริ โทรุ คนทำงานสำนักงานทั่วไป ถูกกลืนหายไปกับรอยแยกมิติ แล้วมาเกิดใหม่ที่ต่างโลก เมื่อมาเกิดใหม่ โทรุ ได้รับ [สกิลบอร์ด] โดยพระเจ้า ใช้ประโยชน์จากมันให้ได้มากที่สุด เพื่อรับสกิลที่จำเป็นทั้งหมด! แม้ว่าเขาจะเป็น "คนต่ำต้อย" เขาก็จะก้าวไปสู่จุดสูงสุด!
description.tr: Normal bir ofis çalışanı olan Toru Minasuki, boyutsal bir yarık tarafından yutuldu ve farklı bir dünyaya reenkarne oldu. Reenkarnasyonun ardından Toru'ya Tanrı tarafından bir [beceri tablosu] verildi. Gerekli tüm becerileri edinmek için bundan en iyi şekilde yararlanın! "Aşağılık bir insan" olmasına rağmen, zirveye doğru yol alacaktır!
description.pt-br: Um trabalhador assalariado normal, Toru Minasuki, foi engolido por uma fenda dimensional e reencarnou em um mundo cheio de vermes e monstros. Após a reencarnação, Toru recebeu um [Quadro de Habilidades] por uma deusa. Aproveite ao máximo para adquirir todas as habilidades necessárias! Mesmo sendo uma "pessoa inferior", ele chegará ao topo?

title.en: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスの大嫌いな女子と結婚することになった。

altTitles.en: I Got Married to the Girl I Hate Most in Class

altTitles.zh-hk: 我要和班裡我最討厭的妹子結婚了。

altTitles.vi: Kết Hôn Với Đứa Con Gái Mà Tôi Ghét Nhất Trong Lớp

description.en:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...
description.ja: 「私と結婚してること、クラスのみんなに言ったら殺すから」これは嫌い合っている二人がお互いを知り、本当の夫婦になるまでの物語。
description.vi:
Học sinh trung học Hojo Saito đã kết hôn với bạn cùng lớp của mình, Sakuramori Akane, cô gái mà cậu xem là kẻ thù lớn nhất trong trường.
“Nếu cậu nói với cả lớp rằng chúng ta đã kết hôn, tớ sẽ giết cậu.”
“Tớ cũng không muốn họ biết đâu. Chẳng có ích gì cả.”
Cuộc sống hôn nhân của họ không diễn ra suôn sẻ và họ thường xuyên xung đột. Tuy nhiên, khi họ cùng trải qua những ngày tháng thường nhật, khoảng cách giữa hai người dần thu hẹp lại, họ có nhiều khoảnh khắc vui vẻ bên nhau hơn, và dần dần bắt đầu hiểu nhau hơn. Saito bắt đầu khám phá ra những khía cạnh dễ thương của Akane mà trước đây cậu chưa từng thấy, còn Akane cũng từ từ nhận ra những cảm xúc mà cô ấy đã giữ kín bấy lâu...
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Hojo Saito se casou com sua colega de classe, Sakuramori Akane, a garota que é seu pior inimigo na escola. 

“Se você contar ao resto da turma que somos casados, eu mato você” 

“Eu também não quero que eles saibam. Não há sentido nisso. ” 

A vida de recém-casados não estava indo muito bem e eles estavam constantemente em conflito. No entanto, à medida que avançam em suas vidas diárias, a distância entre eles diminui, eles passam momentos mais agradáveis juntos e, aos poucos, passam a se entender. Saito aprende sobre o lado fofo de Akane, que ele nunca tinha visto antes, e Akane gradualmente começou a reconhecer os sentimentos que ela estava guardando… 

A vida de recém-casado comovente de duas pessoas que simplesmente não conseguem ser honestas uma com a outra começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: ビリーバット

altTitles.th: บิลลี่ แบ็ท

description.en:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
description.pl: "Billy Bat" przedstawia losy japońsko-amerykańskiego artysty Kevina Yamagaty, autora mangi o identycznym tytule co dzieło, w którym sam występuje, czyli "Billy Bat". Pracuje dla wydawnictwa "Marble Comics". Pewnego dnia do jego mieszkania pukają dwaj detektywi wyglądający jak Laurel Hardy z "Dick Tracy". Informują go, że otrzymali od gospodarza zezwolenie na przeprowadzenie śledztwa sąsiadującego budynku. Wkrótce jeden z detektywów, chudzielec Laurel, zauważa prace Kevina i okazuje się fanem "Billy'ego Bata", podczas gdy otyły Hardy podnosi pojedynczą stronę ze stwierdzeniem, iż komiks wygląda zadziwiająco podobnie do mangi publikowanej niegdyś przez Jumpa. Oskarża bohatera o kradzież tokijskiego dzieła z 1949 roku.
description.es-la:
Billy Bat es un cómic en un cómic y el verdadero protagonista es un artista japonés-americano llamado Kevin Yamagata que dibuja a Billy Bat para "Marble Comics". Poco después pasan al artista en su estudio con su ayudante, dos detectives reales que parecen Laurel y Hardy con trajes y gabardinas de la época de Dick Tracy, llaman a la puerta y se apropian de la habitación de Kevin con el fin de realizar una vigilancia en una habitación de un edificio adyacente. 

Uno de los detectives, el flaco "Laurel", ve el trabajo de Kevin y resulta que es un fanático de Billy Bat. El otro detective, el regordete "Hardy", coge una página diciendo que los personajes le resultan familiares y acusa a Kevin de traducir un viejo cómic "japonés".  
Mientras Hardy recuerda el cómic que cree que Kevin está copiando, hacemos otro salto temporal Urasawaesco al Tokio de 1949...
description.pt-br: Um detetive particular, é o protagonista da história em quadrinhos feita por Kevin Yamagata, um quadrinista americano, descendente de japoneses, famoso por sua história “Billy Bat”. O cotidiano de Kevin é abruptamente ado quando dois detetives entram no estúdio dele, a fim de investigar um vizinho acusado de espionagem. Um desses detetives vê o personagem Billy Bat e diz ter visto aquele desenho enquanto trabalhava no Japão. Suspeitando ter visto o personagem enquanto morava lá e o roubado inconscientemente, Kevin regressa ao Japão para buscar a verdade.

altTitles.ja: ピチカートの眠る森

description.en: Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!

altTitles.ja: かさねがさねの初恋ですが

altTitles.vi: Tình Đầu, Lại Thêm Tình Đầu

description.en: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

altTitles.ja: 花秘める君のメテオール

description.en:
"On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride—"

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.
description.ja:
“呪われた怪物”の花嫁は皆死ぬ、それが宿命――

怪物の花嫁――それは百年に一度、国のどこかに幽閉された人ならざる魔の生き物へ捧げられる生贄……。そんな生贄に選ばれた妹を救うため、身代わりの花嫁となることを決意した子爵家の長女・ステラは、ひとりで赴いた屋敷で血塗られた吸血鬼・ラビと出会う。人を喰らう怪物として疎まれるラビの、深い孤独を知った時、ステラは……？

description.en: After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.

The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

title.en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.ja: 小倉さん家のきなこ
みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba Monogatari: Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

altTitles.th: มหาเวทย์ผนึกมาร

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, he soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en:
Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. 
Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public baths, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... 
even if she can't take a big vacation or travel too far, she's determined to still enjoy any little "vacation" she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: 入学傭兵

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

description.en: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, he’s gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя. Продолжение "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье?" от Оомори Фуджино с новым художником Ямачи Тайсей.

altTitles.ja: ザ・ファブル

description.en:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

title.en: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onna no Ko.

altTitles.ja: 今日、駅で見た可愛い女の子。

altTitles.en: Cute Girl I Saw at the Station Today.

description.en: Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
description.ja: 可愛いもの博識おじさん×完ぺき女子(!?)、駅で一瞬すれ違うだけの観察型コメディ！ アラフォーの亀山は、駅で見かける可愛い子が身に着けているものが気になって仕方がない。この全人類が好きな香りはミルボン！キラキラしたあの箱はセボンスター！ 肌ツヤは……美容医療ではなくハイライト！ どこのブランドが崩れにくい？ あ～～教えてくれ～～～～！ あなたが夢中になった「乙女アイテム」がたくさん登場！

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

description.en: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

altTitles.ja: 円環のエモーションズ

description.en: Arakura Arato is a high school student who is always alert to danger and lives a low-key life. One day, his life changes drastically when he is suddenly attacked by a superpower user named Koki Rara. The power of “EMO”—an ability formed from strong emotions.
description.id: Arakura Arato adalah seorang siswa SMA yang selalu waspada terhadap bahaya dan hidup tanpa menonjol. Suatu hari, kehidupannya berubah drastis ketika tiba-tiba dia diserang oleh seorang pengguna kekuatan super bernama Koki Rara. Arato kemudian terseret dalam pertarungan antara para pengguna kekuatan “EMO”—kemampuan yang terbentuk dari emosi yang kuat. Mampukah Arato bertahan dengan kekuatan “barrier” miliknya yang tidak memiliki daya serang…!?
description.ja: 危険を警戒し、目立たず生きる高校生・荒倉アラト。 ある日突然異能力者・好綺羅羅に襲われ、日常は 崩壊する。強い感情が異能力に転化される「ＥＭＯ能力者」どうしの バトルに巻き込まれたアラトは、バリアという攻撃力０の能力で戦い抜く事が出来るのか…!?

altTitles.ja: 妻、小学生になる。
If my wife become an elementary school student.

altTitles.en: If My Wife Became an Elementary School Student.
My Wife Became An Elementary School Student.

altTitles.es: Mi esposa volvió a la escuela primaria

altTitles.es-la: Si mi esposa renaciera como una estudiante de primaria

altTitles.fr: Ma femme s'est réincarnée en écolière

altTitles.ja: 妻小

altTitles.vi: Vợ tôi là Học sinh Tiểu Học

altTitles.ru: Если бы моя жена стала младшеклассницей

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

description.en:
‘Ha Miro’, a clumsy yet loveable rookie magazine editor, meets mosquito man ‘Mo Ginam’, who can become a ‘normal [ilban]’ person (when together) when ‘blood [pi]’ is ‘cha’.

‘Ha Miro’, the rookie editor for a third-rate fashion magazine company receives an e-mail from rookie model ‘Lee Jihyeon’s manager. With an excited heart, she excitedly sends a deposit over the phone……
description.ko: 어설프지만 사랑스러운 패션잡지 신입 에디터 '하미로', '피'가 '차'야(모여야) '일반'인이 될 수 있는 모기 인간 '모기남'을 만나다.  삼류 패션 잡지 회사의 신입 에디터 '하미로' 어느 날 떠오르는 신예 모델 '이지현'의 매니저라는 사람의 메일을 받게 된다. 들뜬 마음으로 통화를 하고 계약금을 보내버린 그녀……

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

altTitles.es-la: No puedo aprovecharme de mis esclavas por la talentosas que son

description.en:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
どんな理想も全て実現。…そう、有能な部下たちがね。

不慮の事故で転生した少年・アレンはチート能力【再生】を授かる。怪我を負った奴隷の美少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策するも、完治した奴隷たちのチートがヤバすぎて、主人公の出る幕ナシ…！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Shinyuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatteimasu

altTitles.ja: 親友の娘に迫られ困っています

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin'yuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatte imasu

altTitles.en: I'm in Trouble With My Best Friend's Daughter

description.en: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he make her his wife.

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de māmā shì dà míngxīng

description.en: What will happen when an overly-supportive daughter discovers loads of photos of her mom, a famous actress, on the internet posing with her female co-stars in ways that "friends" would not do?

altTitles.ja: 幸色のワンルーム

altTitles.es: Una habitación del color de la felicidad

altTitles.th: หนึ่งห้องแห่งความสุข

description.cs:
Jednoho dne dojde k únosu mladé dívky.
Pro ni je to ale nový začátek, poprvé začne doufat ve šťastný život. Ona mu slíbí, že si ho vezme. On se jí za to snaží do života vnést co nejvíc šťastných chvil.
Jedná se o únosce a jeho oběť… Tak proč k sobě mají tak blízko?
description.de: Sachi kommt mit ihren Eltern nicht klar und will einfach nur weg. Deshalb täuscht sie gemeinsam mit dem Typen, der sie immer stalkt, eine Entführung vor. Versteckt in dessen Einzimmer-Appartment machen die beiden einen Deal: Wenn sie mit der Entführungsnummer durchkommen, wird geheiratet...
description.en:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
description.es: Tras ser secuestrada, una chica desgraciada es feliz por primera vez. El día que la secuestran empieza una vida con un hilo de esperanza. Ella le promete a su secuestrador que se casarán y él le ofrece felicidad. ¿Cómo pueden tener una relación tan cálida siendo un secuestrador y su víctima?
description.id:
"Kalau berhasil lolos, kita akan menikah. Kalau tertangkap, kita mati bersama..."

Begitulah janji yang dilontarkan Sachi pada pemuda yang baru saja menculiknya. Dia yang tak punya tempat di manapun di dunia ini, merasa menemukan kebahagiaan di sisi penculiknya...
description.it:
Un giorno una ragazza di quattordici anni viene rapita. O almeno è quello che la polizia crede. In realtà la ragazza ha provato a fuggire dai violenti genitori e ha trovato rifugio… dal suo stalker, che ora la ospita nel suo appartamento.

Per quanto lui continui a pensare di aver commesso un rapimento, la ragazza è felice di quello che è successo e si dichiara a lui, promettendo che, in caso di cattura, si toglieranno la vita insieme.
description.ja:
薄幸な少女は誘拐されて“幸せ"を初めて知る。

その日、少女は誘拐された。
しかし、それは少女にとって一縷の希望にかけた生活の始まりだった。
少女は誘拐犯に結婚を誓い、誘拐犯は少女にたくさんの“幸せ"を捧ぐ。
被害者と誘拐犯の関係なのに―――どうしてこんなに温かいの?
pixiv&Twitterの超話題作が待望の書籍化!!!
半分以上が本書限定の描き下ろしエピソードを収録!!!
description.pl: W mediach zawrzało. Wieść o zaginionej nastolatce rozniosła się w mgnieniu oka. Policja nie wyklucza porwania. Nikt nie przypuszcza, że płaczący przed kamerą rodzice, od lat znęcali się nad córką. Nie mogąc dłużej tego znieść dziewczyna uciekła z domu i znalazła schronienie pod dachem tajemniczego młodego mężczyzny. Ściany pokoju, w którym teraz mieszka zdobi mozaika zdjęć zrobionych jej z ukrycia. Wybawcą nastolatki jest bowiem jej własny stalker. Choć dziewczyna przebywa z nim dobrowolnie i może odejść w każdej chwili, obydwoje zdają sobie sprawę, że jeśli ktoś pozna ich sekret, mężczyzna natychmiast zostanie skazany za porwanie. Nastolatka proponuje więc swojemu wybawcy niezwykły układ - jeśli zdołają ukryć się do czasu, gdy uzyska pełnoletniość, wezmą ślub. Jeśli złapie ich policja - obydwoje popełnią samobójstwo. Jaki będzie finał tej dramatycznej historii?
description.vi: Một cô gái 14 tuổi bị bắt cóc, nhưng lạ thay, cô không hề kháng cự, tthay vào đó, cô hứa sẽ kết hôn với chính kẻ đã bắt cóc mình, đổi lại anh phải che trở cho cô, đem lại hạnh phúc cho cô - thứ cô chưa từng được biết đến suốt 14 năm xuân xanh của mình. Một câu chuyện cảm động nói về 2 con người- 2 số phận bi đát tìm được nhau, liệu họ có trốn thoát khỏi những kẻ đang săn đuổi mình, liệu hạnh phúc có đến với 2 số phận bi đát kia không...? Chúng ta hãy chờ xem.

title.en: Soshiki no shukuteki to kekkon shitara mecha amai

altTitles.ja: 組織の宿敵と結婚したらめちゃ甘い

altTitles.en: It's so sweet when I marry my organization's nemesis

altTitles.vi: Thật Ngọt Ngào Khi Kết Hôn Với Kẻ Thù Của Tổ Chức Mình

description.en:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

　The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

　After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work.

　But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
description.ja:
「……大っ嫌い！」
「奇遇だな。おれもだ」

　かつて敵対する異能力者の組織に属し、反目し合う目的のために抗争を繰り広げていた二人。
　《羽根狩り》の異名を持つ犀川狼士(さいがわろうし)と、《白魔》と呼ばれる最強の異能力者・柳良律花(なぎらりつか）。
　血で血を洗う毎日を過ごし、まともな社会経験のない二人だったが……

「ろうくん、大好きっ」
「俺もだよ、律花」

　組織解散後はなぜかイチャコラ付き合った上に結婚していた！
　憎さ余って可愛さ100倍？　いまや、毎朝会社に行く際に玄関で「いってらっしゃい」のチューをするくらいバカップルを地で行く夫婦。
　だが夫にはただひとつだけ悩みがあった。
　それは、妻と一度も寝床を共にしたことがないということ……要するに彼は既婚者なのにいまだ童貞であったのだ！
　これはそんな夫が数々のトラブルに巻き込まれながらも、
　身持ちのお堅い妻との愛を深めるため、今日も必死にアプローチを続ける艱難辛苦の物語である。
description.vi:
…. “ta ghét ngươi!”

“trùng hợp thay, tôi cũng vậy”

   Hai người họ từng thuộc hai tổ chức đối địch của những người sử dụng dị năng, và chiến đấu vì những mục đích trái ngược nhau.

       Saikawa Roushi, còn được gọi với cái tên là “thợ săn lông vũ”, và Yanagi Rikka, người sử dụng dị năng mạnh nhất được biết đến với cái tên “bạch ma”. Cả hai đã dành cả ngày để chiến đấu với nhau nên họ không có kinh nghiệm xã hội bình thường nào, thế nhưng…

 “em yêu anh, Rou-kun.”

“anh cũng yêu em. Rikka.”

  Sau khi tổ chức bị tan rã, bằng cách nào đó họ đã bắt đầu hẹn hò và đi đến kết hôn! Có phải sự thù hận của họ đáng yêu gấp 100 lần không? Giờ đây, họ là hình ảnh thu nhỏ của một cặp đôi yêu nhau say đắm, hôn nhau mỗi sáng trước khi đi ra ngoài.

  Nhưng người chồng có một vấn đề khá lớn, Đó là anh chưa bao giờ được ngủ chung giường với vợ mình… Nói cách khác, mặc dù đã kết hôn nhưng anh vẫn còn trinh! Đây là câu chuyện về những khó khăn mà người chồng phải đối mặt, dù vướng vào vô số rắc rối vẫn tiếp tục cố gắng để vun đắp tình yêu với người vợ nghiêm khắc của mình.

description.en:
The Adresia empire on the Vogel continent. There is a battle over the throne of such an empire that possesses powerful military and vast territory. With the successor undecided, the children of the emperor are vying to expand their power. However, there was one prince that everyone says will definitely not become the emperor. The seventh prince, Arnold Lakes Adler. The young man who was inferior to his younger twin brother in every way, the dull prince.

Incompetent and lethargic, Arnold wastes everyday just playing around. However, behind the scenes, he is one of the only five SS-Class adventurers called 'Silver'. Seeing the intensifying battle for the throne he decided "I don't want to die so let’s have my little brother become the emperor..."
description.ja: 「出涸らし皇子」と帝国中から馬鹿にされる無気力皇子・アルノルト。しかし実は、禁忌の古代魔法を操るＳＳ級冒険者・シルバーという裏の顔を持つ最強皇子だった!?

description.en: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.
description.ko:
나는 인베이더를 죽이는 사람이 되고 싶다. 
―
인베이더를 죽이고 특수종의 세상에 살며 일상의 행복도 유지하고 싶다. 
그걸 바라면 안 될까? 
왜? 왜 그래서는 안 되나. 
두 마리 토끼를 쫓다가는 둘 다 놓친다고 하지만, 
안 놓치면 된다.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

title.en: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World

description.en: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

title.en: The Homeless Saint in the Abandoned Park

altTitles.ja: 廃公園のホームレス聖女

description.en:
Alm, who worked at the temple as a saint, was physically and mentally worn out from the power harassment from the priest Johannes. However, one day, the thin thread she had been holding onto snapped, and she declared her resignation as a saint. 

Alm, who had run away from the temple, bought an abandoned park and decided to live a leisurely life there. On the other hand, the temple - which had lost their saint and was no longer able to function - was in a frenzy!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
description.ja: DT(童貞)を捨てたいと悩む高校生・羽柴ジュンイチ。ある日、「ギャルに土下座で頼めば卒業できる」という迷信を聞いて、ダメ元でクラスのギャル・八女に土下座で告白した所…まさかの大成功!? 見事付き合うことになるのだが、ビッチなのに身持ちは固い八女さんに、非リアな羽柴は弄ばれる毎日で…。果たして羽柴は「はじめて」から卒業できるのか!?
description.vi: Mùa xuân, mùa của tình yêu đã đến và có vẻ như việc tìm ra bạn gái của anh ấy khó hơn với Junichi. Để tìm ra cách, bạn của Junichi buộc anh phải thú nhận với cô gái, Yame Yukana. Tuy nhiên, mọi việc không diễn ra như anh mong đợi. và cái gì tới nó tới
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.
